SELECT history.idx ,history.send_date ,history.target_mem ,history.target_platform ,history.push_slct ,history.push_type ,history.image_type ,history.send_type ,history.target_cnt ,history.send_title ,history.send_cont ,IF(history.admin_idx = '0', history.mem_no, NULL) AS mem_no ,IF(history.admin_idx = '0', history.mem_nick, admin.op_name) AS mem_nick ,history.send_etc ,history.send_cnt ,history.succ_cnt ,history.fail_cnt ,history.succ_rate ,history.click_cnt ,history.click_rate ,history.admin_idx ,history.ins_date ,history.last_upd_date FROM rd_stmp.smtp_push_history AS history LEFT JOIN rd_admin.tb_admin_push AS admin ON history.admin_idx = admin.idx WHERE history.idx = #{idx}

SELECT push.mem_no , mem.mem_id , mem.mem_nick , mem.mem_userid , mem.mem_name , mem.mem_phone , mem.mem_sex , mem.mem_birth_year , mem.mem_birth_month , mem.mem_birth_day , mem.mem_slct , mem.mem_state , mem.mem_join_date FROM rd_stmp.smtp_push_history AS push LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_member_basic AS mem ON push.mem_no = mem.mem_no WHERE push.idx = #{idx}
